DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy of Tap block after cesarean delivery as a component of multimodal analgesia and evaluation of postoperative drugs consumption.
DOC.brief_title: Tap Block and Cesarean Delivery: Efficacy and Consumption of Postoperative Drugs
DOC.criteria: age > 18 years written consent anesthesiologist's assent on preoperative evaluation age< 18 years uncooperative patients written consent not obtained local anesthetic allergy BMI > 35
